t: And*p in that day thou shalt say, O Lord,*s I will praise thee: though thou wast angry with me, thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortedst me.
Behold,*p God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the Lord*s Jehovah*s is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
Therefore*p with joy shall ye draw water out of the wells of salvation.
And*p in that day shall ye say, Praise the Lord,*s call upon his name, declare his doings among the people, make mention that his name is exalted.
Sing*p unto the Lord;*s for he hath done excellent things: this is known in all the earth.
Cry*p out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion: for great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.
